```{r knitrOptSet, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Set Global knitr chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE, results="asis", message=FALSE) 
                      #cache=TRUE, autodep = TRUE)

# Allow caption assignment in chunk.
knitr::opts_knit$set(eval.after = 'fig.cap')

# Assign global variable for type of knitr chunk (i.e. 'latex' | 'html').
knitr_chunk <- knitr::opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to")
if (knitr_chunk == "latex") {
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(dev='pdf')
}

```{r globalSet, message = FALSE}

# For PDF compilation of Bookdown Doc, LaTeX install required.
require(tinytex)
require(bookdown)

# Load libraries
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)

# Fix xcolor warning from TEXshade causing segfault:
# https://github.com/rstudio/rmarkdown/issues/1384#issuecomment-400092146
options(kableExtra.latex.load_packages = FALSE)
library(kableExtra)

# Load specimen data and Thesis functions.
library(ThesisPackage)

# Define map object for state and county boundaries.
gg_borders <- map_borders(border_color = "black")
